sentences.en: Agricultural technical secordary schools is the mainstay of Vocation education.
sentences.cn: 农业中专教育工作为职业教育的骨干,必须面向“三农”适应人才培养需要,尽快建立与市场经济发展相协调的办学机制.

sentences.en: Agriculture is still the mainstay of the country’s economy.
sentences.cn: 农业仍然是这个国家经济的支柱。

sentences.en: Anticoagulation remains the mainstay of therapy for patients with venous thromboembolism.
sentences.cn: 抗凝仍然是主要治疗方法.

sentences.en: Currently , high pressure water jet is the mainstay technology descaling billets.
sentences.cn: 高压水射流技术是当今钢铁除鳞的主流技术.

sentences.en: For now, even Mammy, her mainstay, had gone back to Tara.
sentences.cn: 因为现在连她的主要支柱嬷嬷也回塔拉去了.

sentences.en: He is the mainstay of our theatre group.
He thinks he's a mainstay of the company, but he's really rather small beer.
sentences.cn: 他自以为是公司的台柱, 但事实上他是个微不足道的人.

sentences.en: Self - confidence and self - reliance are the mainstay of a strong character.
sentences.cn: 自信 与自靠是坚强品格的柱石.

sentences.en: She is the mainstay of our workshop.
sentences.cn: 她是我们车间的主心骨.

sentences.en: State enterprises are the mainstay of the national economy of our country.
sentences.cn: 国有企业是我国国民经济的支柱.

sentences.en: The catering trade has become a mainstay for the city.
sentences.cn: 饮食业已经成为这个城市的支柱产业.

sentences.en: The State - owned mining enterprises are the mainstay in mining mineral resources.
sentences.cn: 国有 矿山企业是开采矿产资源的主体.

sentences.en: Therefore, the thesis will emphatically study the mainstay of environmental education.
sentences.cn: 基于此, 本文将着重研究环境教育的价值之维.

sentences.en: This principle of collective bargaining has been a mainstay in labor relations in this country.
sentences.cn: 这一集体谈判原则已经成为该国劳动关系的重要基础。

sentences.en: With the advent of gunpowder, Musketeers became the mainstay of European armies.
sentences.cn: 由于火药的出现, 持枪步兵成为欧洲军队的支柱.

sentences.en: Women became the mainstay of Dagu performers after liberation.
sentences.cn: 解放后鼓书演员以女性为多.

words.tran_cn: 主要的，最重要的；全力的
主要部分，要点；体力；总管道
主要动力；（钟表）主发条；主要原因；主要动机
支柱；中流砥柱；主要的依靠；主桅支索

trans.tran_cn: 支柱，柱石，骨干，中流砥柱，主要的依靠，主桅支索
trans.tran_en: an important part of something that makes it possible for it to work properly or continue to exist
